mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( MemberNo, MemberId, MemberName, MemberBirth, MemberPhoneNumber, MemberPassword, MemberEmail, MemberPostcode, MemberAddress1, MemberAddress2, MemberMaritalStatus, MemberAnniversary, MemberStore, MemberBizReferenceCode ) VALUES ( member_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberPhoneNumber}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPostcode}, #{memberAddress1}, #{memberAddress2}, #{memberMaritalStatus}, #{memberAnniversary}, #{memberStore}, #{memberBizReferenceCode} )
